p: In a previous study on the etiology of acute febrile illness in Abidjan, an inter epidemic DENV prevalence of 0.4% was reported in the 812 patients tested [ 25]. Similarly, our work highlights an inter epidemic circulation of DENV in poor urban settings of Dakar. The difference in prevalence between the two studies may be attributable to the fact that the study conducted in Abidjan was not limited to children â‰¤10 years of age, as well as the smaller number of enrolled patients in our study (104 patients).
